General.Name: Fibocom Wireless Inc
General.Description: Fibocom Wireless Inc. provides wireless communication modules and communication solutions worldwide. The company offers 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G, and NB-lot technology wireless communication modules and communication solutions. Its products are used in mobile payment, smart grid, Internet of vehicles, security monitoring, mobile Internet, and other fields. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Shenzhen International Innovation Valley, Shenzhen, China

3.Name: Mr. August Daniel Schieler
3.Title: Sr. VP of Overseas IoT Sales Department
